content: make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 6 sts drip 7 chain 11 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 8 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 12 sts drip 8 chain 6 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 3 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 3 sts 8 sts drip 9 chain 7 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each
